snippet: Nicolás Almagro and Fernando Verdasco set up an all-Spanish final in the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston, and the Spaniards Marcel Granollers and Guillermo García-López advanced to the final of the Grand Prix Hassan II in...
abstract: Nicolas Almagro and Fernando Verdasco set up an all-Spanish final in the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston, and the Spaniards Marcel Granollers and Guillermo Garcia-Lopez advance to the final of the Grand Prix Hassan II in Casablanca, Morocco; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Nicolás Almagro and Fernando Verdasco set up an all-Spanish final in the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston, and the Spaniards Marcel Granollers and Guillermo García-López advanced to the final of the Grand Prix Hassan II in Casablanca, Morocco.
